title: Esquire UK Serif
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122070051im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/EsquireUK_5731.jpg)

Hi,  
Does anyone know what the serif typeface used in the redesign of Esquire Magazine UK? It is used throughout the magazine, but is show on this cover.

Thanks,

Eleanor

 [‹ What typeface can this be? ? ?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122070051/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48419 "Go to previous forum topic") [I'd really like to know ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122070051/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48434 "Go to next forum topic")
author: eleanorrogers

comments.content: Does anyone know about the all caps swash sans used for the words, “Please Hold” and the rest of the titles on the cover?
Thanks akira1975! It’s a tad silly, but Esquire pulls it off with characteristic irreverence.
